alert.note: Alert for Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 12 at 8:01PM EST until December 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Rhode Island...Massachusetts... Pawtuxet River At Cranston affecting Providence and Kent Counties. Shawsheen River At Andover affecting Essex County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Rhode Island... Wood River At Hope Valley affecting Washington County. For the Shawsheen River...including Wilmington, Andover...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pawtuxet River...including Scituate Reservoir, Cranston... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Shawsheen River at Andover. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Floodwaters encroach on very lowest lying business parking lots off of Route 114 in Lawrence and North Andover that are adjacent to the Shawsheen River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 28.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 29.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 115 AM EST.
